name: EMBRYOLOGY_RESULT
description: Information about the results in an andrology or embryology lab.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: RESP_REQ_OVERRIDE_YN
columns.description: Whether any responsibility requirements for this embryology result was overridden.

columns.name: RESP_REQ_OVERRIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that overrode responsibility requirements for this embryology result.

columns.name: RESP_REQ_OVERRIDE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: RESP_REQ_OVERRIDE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant that the responsibility requirements for this embryology result was overridden.

columns.name: RESP_REQ_OVRIDE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason that the responsibility requirement for this embryology result was overridden.

columns.name: RESP_REQ_OVERRIDE_COMMENT
columns.description: Comment for the responsibility requirement override for this embryology result.
